/* CouponMapper.xml, getCouponProdCaseCode, 쿠폰코드 ID 를 이용 상품유명코드 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-18 */ SELECT A.PROD_CASE_CD FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD ='PD002501' AND A.SRC_CONTENT_ID= #{scrContentId}

/* CouponMapper.xml, getSpecialProdCnt, 에피소드id를 이용해 특가 여부 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-18 */ SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD WHERE PROD_ID =#{episodeId} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND CPN_ID IS NOT NULL AND TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SPRC_APPLY_END_DT
mapper.update: /* CouponMapper.xml, updateTbDpProdInfo, TB_DP_PROD 테이블에 UPDATE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ update TB_DP_PROD set PROD_CHRG_YN = NVL(#{prodChrgYn},PROD_CHRG_YN) /* 상품_유료_여부 */ ,SELLER_MBR_NO = NVL(#{sellerMbrNo},SELLER_MBR_NO) /* 판매자_회원_번호 */ ,SVC_GRP_CD = NVL(#{svcGrpCd},SVC_GRP_CD) /* 서비스_그룹_코드 */ ,SVC_TYPE_CD = NVL(#{svcTypeCd},SVC_TYPE_CD) /* 서비스_타입_코드 */ ,PROD_GRD_CD = NVL(#{prodGrdCd},PROD_GRD_CD) /* 상품_등급_코드 */ ,CID = NVL(#{cid},CID) /* CID */ ,FEE_CASE_CD = NVL(#{feeCaseCd},FEE_CASE_CD) /* 요금_유형_코드 */ ,USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD= NVL(#{usePeriodUnitCd},USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD) /* 사용_기간_단위_코드 */ ,USE_PERIOD = NVL(#{usePeriod},USE_PERIOD) /* 사용_기간 */ ,DRM_YN = NVL(#{drmYn},DRM_YN) /* DRM_여부 */ ,META_CLSF_CD = NVL(#{metaClsfCd},META_CLSF_CD) /* 메타_구분_코드(CT28) */ ,CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = NVL(#{contentsTypeCd},CONTENTS_TYPE_CD) /* 컨텐츠_타입_코드(PD0057, PD0073, PD0093, PD0104) */ ,TOP_MENU_ID = NVL(#{topMenuId},TOP_MENU_ID) /* 상위메뉴아이디 (DP28) */ ,UPD_ID = NVL(#{updId},UPD_ID) /* 수정_ID */ ,UPD_DT = sysdate /* 수정_일시 */ where 1=1 AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}

/* CouponMapper.xml, updateTbDpShpgProdInfo,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD 테이블에 UPDATE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ update TB_DP_SHPG_PROD set EPSD_CNT = NVL(#{epsdCnt},EPSD_CNT) /* 에피소드_수 */ ,CHNL_COMP_NM = NVL(#{chnlCompNm},CHNL_COMP_NM) /* 채널_회사_명 */ ,SALE_YN = NVL(#{saleYn},SALE_YN) /* 판매_여부 */ ,CONTENTS_ORDR_CD = NVL(#{contentsOrdrCd},CONTENTS_ORDR_CD) /* 컨텐츠_오더_코드(D) */ ,SALE_CNT = NVL(#{saleCnt},SALE_CNT) /* 판매_수량 */ ,MM_MAX_SALE_QTY = NVL(#{mmMaxSaleQty},MM_MAX_SALE_QTY) /* 월_최대_판매_수량 */ ,DAY_MAX_SALE_QTY = NVL(#{dayMaxSaleQty},DAY_MAX_SALE_QTY) /* 일_최대_판매_수량 */ ,MM_MBR_MAX_PRCHS_QTY = NVL(#{mmMbrMaxPrchsQty},MM_MBR_MAX_PRCHS_QTY) /* 월_회원_최대_구매_수량 */ ,DAY_MBR_MAX_PRCHS_QTY = NVL(#{dayMbrMaxPrchsQty},DAY_MBR_MAX_PRCHS_QTY) /* 일_회원_최대_구매_수량 */ ,FIRST_MAX_PRCHS_QTY = NVL(#{firstMaxPrchsQty},FIRST_MAX_PRCHS_QTY) /* 1차_최대_구매_수량 */ ,USE_PLAC = #{usePlac} /* 사용_장소 */ ,USE_LIMT_DESC = #{useLimtDesc} /* 사용_제한_설명 */ ,NOTICE_MATT = #{noticeMatt} /* 공지_사항 */ ,PRCHS_CANCEL_DRBK_REASON= #{prchsCancelDrbkReason} /* 구매_취소_환불_사유 */ ,PROD_CASE_CD = NVL(#{prodCaseCd},PROD_CASE_CD) /* 상품_유형_코드(DP0063) */ ,B2B_PROD_YN = NVL(#{b2bProdYn},B2B_PROD_YN) /* B2B_상품_여부 */ ,DLV_PROD_YN = NVL(#{dlvProdYn},DLV_PROD_YN) /* 배송_상품_여부 */ ,MANG_BP_ID = #{mangBpId} /* 관리_BP_ID */ ,COUPON_SEND_TYPE = NVL(#{couponSendType},COUPON_SEND_TYPE) /* 쿠폰_발송_타입 */ ,UPD_ID = NVL(#{updId},UPD_ID) /* 수정_ID */ ,UPD_DT = sysdate /* 수정_일시 */ where 1=1 AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}

/* CouponMapper.xml, updateTbDpProdDescInfo,TB_DP_PROD_DESC 테이블에 UPDATE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ update TB_DP_PROD_DESC set PROD_NM = #{prodNm} /* */ ,PROD_BASE_DESC= #{prodBaseDesc} /* */ ,PROD_DTL_DESC = #{prodDtlDesc} /* */ ,PROD_INTR_DSCR= #{prodIntrDscr} /* */ ,PROD_USE_MTD = #{prodUseMtd} /* */ ,UPD_ID = NVL(#{updId},UPD_ID) /* */ ,UPD_DT = sysdate /* */ where 1=1 AND PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}
mapper.select: /* CouponMapper.xml, selectTbDpProdCatalogMapgInfo,상품 ID로 카탈로그 가져오기 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ SELECT CATALOG_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG WHERE PROD_ID= #{prodId} AND BASE_YN ='Y' AND USE_YN ='Y' AND ROWNUM =1
mapper.update: /* CouponMapper.xml, updateTbDpProdCatalogMapgInfo,TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG 테이블에 UPDATE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ update TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG set BASE_YN = NVL(#{baseYn},BASE_YN) /* 기본_여부 */ ,USE_YN = NVL(#{useYn},USE_YN) /* 사용_여부 */ ,UPD_ID = NVL(#{updId},UPD_ID) /* 수정_ID */ ,UPD_DT = sysdate /* 수정_일시 */ where 1=1 AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.delete: /* CouponMapper.xml, removeTbDpProdOpt,TB_DP_PROD_OPT 테이블에 DELETE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ DELETE FROM TB_DP_PROD_OPT WHERE CHNL_PROD_ID = #{chnlProdId}
mapper.update: /* CouponMapper.xml, updateTbDpTenantProdInfo, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD 테이블에 UPDATE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ update TB_DP_TENANT_PROD set PROD_STATUS_CD= NVL(#{prodStatusCd},PROD_STATUS_CD) /* */ ,EXPO_YN = NVL(#{expoYn},EXPO_YN) /* */ ,EXPO_ORD = NVL(#{expoOrd},EXPO_ORD) /* */ ,UPD_ID = NVL(#{updId},UPD_ID) /* */ ,UPD_DT = sysdate /* */ where 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}

/* CouponMapper.xml, updateTbDpTenantProdPriceInfo, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE 테이블에 UPDATE, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ update TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE set APPLY_START_DT = TO_DATE(#{applyStartDt},'yyyymmddhh24miss') /* 적용_시작_일시 */ ,SEQ = NVL(#{seq},SEQ) /* SEQ */ ,APPLY_END_DT = TO_DATE(#{applyEndDt},'yyyymmddhh24miss') /* 적용_종료_일시 */ ,PROD_AMT = NVL(#{prodAmt},PROD_AMT) /* 상품_금액 */ ,CHNL_UNLMT_AMT = NVL(#{chnlUnlmtAmt},CHNL_UNLMT_AMT) /* 채널_무제한_금액 */ ,CHNL_PERIOD_AMT= NVL(#{chnlPeriodAmt},CHNL_PERIOD_AMT) /* 채널_기간_금액 */ ,PROD_NET_AMT = NVL(#{prodNetAmt},PROD_NET_AMT) /* 상품_정찰_금액 */ ,DC_RATE = NVL(#{dcRate},DC_RATE) /* 할인_율 */ ,DC_AMT = NVL(#{dcAmt},DC_AMT) /* 할인_금액 */ ,DC_AFT_PROD_AMT = NVL(#{dcAftProdAmt},DC_AFT_PROD_AMT) /* 할인_후_상품_금액 */ ,TAX_CLSF = NVL(#{taxClsf},TAX_CLSF) /* 세금_구분 */ ,UPD_ID = NVL(#{updId},UPD_ID) /* 수정_ID */ ,UPD_DT = sysdate /* 수정_일시 */ where 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.select: /* CouponMapper.xml, selectCatalogNmMenuId, 카탈로그 및 메뉴ID 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-11-18 */ SELECT A.CATALOG_NM AS catalogName ,B.MENU_ID AS menuId ,C.REG_ID as regId ,TO_CHAR(C.REG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') AS regDt FROM TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG_DESC A ,TB_DP_MENU_SHPG_MAPG B ,TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CATALOG_ID = B.CATALOG_ID AND A.CATALOG_ID = C.CATALOG_ID AND A.CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId} AND ROWNUM =1
/* CouponMapper.xml, selectSpSettleRegProd,SP_SETT_REG_PROD 프로시저 호출, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ {CALL SP_SETT_REG_PROD(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)}
mapper.update: /* CouponMapper.xml, updateDPCouponItemCNT, 전시단 쿠폰상품 판매중인 ITEM의 갯수 변경, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ UPDATE TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SET EPSD_CNT = ( SELECT COUNT(B.PART_PROD_ID) FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A ,(SELECT PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId} ) B ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PART_PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID =C.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND C.EXPO_YN ='Y' AND C.TENANT_ID =#{tenentId} ) WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}

/* CouponMapper.xml, updateCatalogTenantStatus, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD 테이블에 CATALOG_ID 저장 및 수정, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2016-01-11 */ MERGE INTO TB_DP_TENANT_PROD A USING DUAL ON (A.TENANT_ID = #{tenentId} AND A.PROD_ID = #{catalogId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.PROD_STATUS_CD = (CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(B.PROD_ID) FROM TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG A ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.BASE_YN ='Y' AND A.USE_YN ='Y' AND B.EXPO_YN ='Y' AND B.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND B.TENANT_ID =#{tenentId} AND A.CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId} ) > 0 THEN 'PD000403' ELSE 'PD000404' END) , A.UPD_ID = #{updId} , A.UPD_DT = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.TENANT_ID , A.PROD_ID , A.PROD_STATUS_CD , A.EXPO_YN , A.EXPO_ORD , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DT , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{tenentId} , #{catalogId} , (CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(B.PROD_ID) FROM TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG A ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.BASE_YN ='Y' AND A.USE_YN ='Y' AND B.EXPO_YN ='Y' AND B.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND B.TENANT_ID =#{tenentId} AND A.CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId} ) > 0 THEN 'PD000403' ELSE 'PD000404' END) , 'Y' , '1' ,#{regId} ,sysdate ,#{updId} ,sysdate )

/* CouponMapper.xml, updateDPYNStatus, 전시단 쿠폰 전시여부 변경, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ MERGE INTO TB_DP_PROD_OPT A USING ( SELECT T1.CHNL_PROD_ID ,T1.OPT1_NM ,CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN T3.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END EXPO_YN FROM TB_DP_PROD_OPT T1 , TB_DP_SHPG_PROD T2 , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD T3 WHERE T1.CHNL_PROD_ID != T1.EPSD_PROD_ID AND T1.EPSD_PROD_ID = T2.PROD_ID AND T1.EPSD_PROD_ID = T3.PROD_ID AND T3.EXPO_YN ='Y' AND T1.CHNL_PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND T3.TENANT_ID =#{tenentId} GROUP BY T1.CHNL_PROD_ID, T1.OPT1_NM ) B ON (A.CHNL_PROD_ID = B.CHNL_PROD_ID AND A.OPT1_NM = B.OPT1_NM AND EXPO_ORD = 1) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.EXPO_YN = B.EXPO_YN

/* CouponMapper.xml, updateSpecialProdStop, 특가(팅) 상품 판매 중지, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-05-18 */ UPDATE TB_DP_SPRC_PROD SET EXPO_YN = 'N' , UPD_ID = 'shopping_cms' , UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND PROD_ID =#{itemCode} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND CPN_ID IS NOT NULL AND TENANT_ID = #{tenentId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SPRC_APPLY_END_DT
mapper.select: /* CouponMapper.xml, GET_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_INFO, 특가 상품 목록 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ SELECT COUNT(A.PROD_ID) as CNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SRC_CONTENT_ID = CASE WHEN PROD_CASE_CD = 'DP006303' THEN ( SELECT SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SP ,TB_DP_SPRC_PROD SP1 WHERE 1=1 AND SP.PROD_ID = SP1.PROD_ID AND SP.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.SRC_CONTENT_ID =#{prodId} ) AND SP1.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SP1.TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SP1.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SP1.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND SP1.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007501','DP007502') --DP007501 : 일반특가 , DP007502 일반 배송 특가 AND ROWNUM =1 ) ELSE #{prodId} END AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007501','DP007502') --DP007501 : 일반특가 , DP007502 일반 배송 특가 AND A.TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_TING_PRODUCT_INFO, 팅요금제 상품 목록 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ SELECT COUNT(A.PROD_ID) as CNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SRC_CONTENT_ID = CASE WHEN PROD_CASE_CD = 'DP006303' THEN ( SELECT SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SP ,TB_DP_SPRC_PROD SP1 WHERE 1=1 AND SP.PROD_ID = SP1.PROD_ID AND SP.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.SRC_CONTENT_ID =#{prodId} ) AND SP1.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SP1.TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SP1.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SP1.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND SP1.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007503','DP007504') AND ROWNUM =1 ) ELSE #{prodId} END AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007503','DP007504') --DP007503 : 팅요금제 일반 특가 , DP007504 팅요금제 배송 특가 AND A.TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_ONE_BRAND_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_INFO, one Brand 특가 상품 목록 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2016-01-08 */ SELECT COUNT(A.PROD_ID) as CNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SRC_CONTENT_ID = CASE WHEN PROD_CASE_CD = 'DP006303' THEN ( SELECT SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SP ,TB_DP_SPRC_PROD SP1 WHERE 1=1 AND SP.PROD_ID = SP1.PROD_ID AND SP.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.SRC_CONTENT_ID =#{itemCode} ) AND SP1.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SP1.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SP1.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SP1.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND SP1.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007501','DP007502') --DP007501 : 일반특가 , DP007502 일반 배송 특가 AND ROWNUM =1 ) ELSE #{itemCode} END AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007501','DP007502') --DP007501 : 일반특가 , DP007502 일반 배송 특가 AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_ONE_BRAND_TING_PRODUCT_INFO, one Brand 팅요금제 상품 목록 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2016-01-08 */ SELECT COUNT(A.PROD_ID) as CNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SRC_CONTENT_ID = CASE WHEN PROD_CASE_CD = 'DP006303' THEN ( SELECT SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SP ,TB_DP_SPRC_PROD SP1 WHERE 1=1 AND SP.PROD_ID = SP1.PROD_ID AND SP.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.SRC_CONTENT_ID =#{itemCode} ) AND SP1.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SP1.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SP1.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SP1.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND SP1.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007503','DP007504') AND ROWNUM =1 ) ELSE #{itemCode} END AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.SPRC_TYPE_CD IN ('DP007503','DP007504') --DP007503 : 팅요금제 일반 특가 , DP007504 팅요금제 배송 특가 AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_DETAIL, 특가 상품 상세 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ SELECT #{couponCode} as couponCode ,C.SRC_CONTENT_ID as itemCode ,B.PROD_NM as eventName ,(CASE WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007501' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007502' THEN 'SL' WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007503' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007504' THEN 'TG' END) AS eventType ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as eventStartDate ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as eventEndDate ,A.SPRC_DC_RATE as eventDcRate ,A.SPRC_PRICE as eventPrice ,A.SPRC_DC_PRICE as eventDcPrice FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.SRC_CONTENT_ID = #{itemCode} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND ROWNUM =1

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_ONE_BRAND_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_DETAIL,one Brand 특가 상품 상세 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ SELECT #{couponCode} as couponCode ,C.SRC_CONTENT_ID as itemCode ,B.PROD_NM as sprcName ,(CASE WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007501' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007502' THEN 'SL' WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007503' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007504' THEN 'TG' END) AS sprcType ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as sprcStartDate ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as sprcEndDate ,A.SPRC_DC_RATE as sprcDcRate ,A.SPRC_PRICE as sprcPrice ,A.SPRC_DC_PRICE as sprcDcPrice FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.SRC_CONTENT_ID = #{itemCode} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND ROWNUM =1

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_ONE_BRAND_TENANT_ID_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_DETAIL,one Brand 특가 상품 상세(TENANT_ID)조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2014-01-08 */ SELECT A.TENANT_ID FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.SRC_CONTENT_ID = #{itemCode} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT ORDER BY A.TENANT_ID

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_DETAIL_LIST_FOR_DATE, 특정 기간에 대한 특가 상품 상세 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-24 */ SELECT ( SELECT SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A1 ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B1 WHERE A1.PROD_ID = B1.PROD_ID AND B1.PROD_RSHP_CD ='DP010802' AND B1.PART_PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND ROWNUM =1 ) as couponCode ,C.SRC_CONTENT_ID as itemCode ,A.SEQ AS eventSeq ,B.PROD_NM as eventName ,(CASE WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007501' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007502' THEN 'SL' WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007503' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007504' THEN 'TG' END) AS eventType ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as eventStartDate ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as eventEndDate FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND (TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR #{startDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AND TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') OR #{endDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AND TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') )

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_ONE_BRAND_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_DETAIL_LIST_FOR_DATE, one Brand 특정 기간에 대한 특가 상품 상세 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-24 */ SELECT DISTINCT ( SELECT SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD A1 ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B1 WHERE A1.PROD_ID = B1.PROD_ID AND B1.PROD_RSHP_CD ='DP010802' AND B1.PART_PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND ROWNUM =1 ) as couponCode ,C.SRC_CONTENT_ID as itemCode ,B.PROD_NM as sprcName ,(CASE WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007501' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007502' THEN 'SL' WHEN A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007503' OR A.SPRC_TYPE_CD='DP007504' THEN 'TG' END) AS sprcType ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as sprcStartDate ,TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as sprcEndDate FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND (TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR #{startDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AND TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') OR #{endDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AND TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') )

/* CouponMapper.xml, GET_ONE_BRAND_TENANT_ID_SPECIAL_PRODUCT_DETAIL_LIST_FOR_DATE, one Brand 특정 기간에 대한 특가 상품 상세 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-24 */ SELECT A.SEQ as sprcSeq ,A.TENANT_ID FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND C.SRC_CONTENT_ID =#{itemCode} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT AND (TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR #{startDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AND TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') OR #{endDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_START_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') AND TO_CHAR(A.SPRC_APPLY_END_DT,'yyyyMMddHH24miss') ) ORDER BY A.TENANT_ID

/* CouponMapper.xml, getShoppingIngYn, 쇼핑 사용중인 상품 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-06-02 */ SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(B.CATALOG_ID)> 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ingYn FROM TB_DP_SHPG_BRAND A ,TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG B ,TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG G ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP H ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD I ,TB_DP_PROD J ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD K ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE L WHERE 1=1 AND A.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND B.CATALOG_ID = G.CATALOG_ID AND G.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND H.PROD_ID != H.PART_PROD_ID AND H.PART_PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_ID = K.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_ID = L.PROD_ID AND K.TENANT_ID = L.TENANT_ID AND K.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND H.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/ AND EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_DP_TENANT_PROD WHERE TENANT_ID =K.TENANT_ID AND PROD_ID =B.CATALOG_ID AND PROD_STATUS_CD ='PD000403' AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' ) AND G.BASE_YN ='Y' /* Y : 기본(기본여부) */ AND G.USE_YN ='Y' /* Y : 기본(기본여부) */ AND NVL(I.B2B_PROD_YN, 'N') != 'Y' AND K.TENANT_ID = 'S01' /* INPUT 테넌트ID */
#{item}

/* CouponMapper.xml, getShoppingCatalogIdByChannelId,채널ID를 이용 카탈로그ID 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-06-02 */ SELECT CATALOG_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG WHERE BASE_YN ='Y' AND USE_YN ='Y' AND PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND ROWNUM = 1

/* CouponMapper.xml, getSpecialProductCouponId,팅/특가 쿠폰 ID 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-18 */ SELECT CPN_ID FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD WHERE PROD_ID =#{episodeId} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND CPN_ID IS NOT NULL AND TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SPRC_APPLY_END_DT

/* CouponMapper.xml, getCouponCompareItemCode,쿠폰코드를 이용 아이템 코드값을 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2015-07-18 */ SELECT B.SRC_CONTENT_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID=#{channelId} AND A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/
